entry.source: {F812}Beelzebub\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351201}The slaying of a king is like the{F801}slaying of a god. Now, I must put an{F801}end to your blood-streaked soul.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351202}But, rejoice, for I shall use your{F801}body as my new vessel.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Beelzebub\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351201}The slaying of a king is like the{F801}slaying of a god. Now, I must put an{F801}end to your blood-streaked soul.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351202}But, rejoice, for I shall use your{F801}body as my new vessel.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Beelzebub\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351203}...I shall not perish.{F801}I will return.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351204}Just as thousands of flies appear from{F801}filth, I will appear once again.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Beelzebub\0{F87A,0}{F813,0,351203}...I shall not perish.{F801}I will return.{F801}{F802}{F813,0,351204}Just as thousands of flies appear from{F801}filth, I will appear once again.{F801}
